name: DELL OPTIPLEX 780 DESKTOP CORE 2 QUAD 2.4GHZ 4GB 160GB 22" MONITOR WINDOWS 10 64BIT Certified Refurbished

q_a.a: Sorry I am not a gamer but it memory is vast

q_a.a: No it is not I'm afraid

q_a.a: All I can say ,this pc,monster,is great value for money ðŸ˜€,enjoy it.

What year is this

q_a.a: You have to buy an adapter, great computer no problem at all

q_a.q: Can you play games such as Minecraft or Planet Coaster on this with good framerate?
Is this system suitable for a small charity, running Xero accounts package etc.
is this good for gaming?
q_a.a: No - not very powerful - ideal for small office users

q_a.q: Can I install a graphics card to this
Does it have wifi
can it play fortnite? and what is the best graphics card for it

q_a.a: Yes, Wired keyboard and mouse is supplied with this computer.

q_a.q: can you play fortnite on it?
I'm having trouble using a webcam on this is there something missing?
q_a.a: There is no webcam, you would have to buy a separate webcam for this monitor.

q_a.q: Would this be good for running music production programmes like cubase ? Thanks
has it got speakers
q_a.a: NO sorry it doesn't, you will have to buy them separate.

reviews.content: you wouldnt even know it is refurbished pc its like brand new all windows 10 and works great

Came a day early and very well packaged. Free processor upgrade and upgraded DVD R/W drive included. Free wireless USB adaptor thrown in as well. Prompt helpful support available for me to set it up. Looks new, cannot fault for the price and would definitely recommend.
David

The computer came with a Dell widescreen monitor. I have paid double the price of the whole package for a similar monitor in the past. Top tip- the image quality isn't great with the supplied VGA cable. Buy a display port to DVI cable for Â£8 and the quality of the image becomes superb. For less than the price of a second hand mobile phone we have a very good desktop computer and excellent monitor. Happy.
https://www.amazon.co.uk/AmazonBasics-DisplayPort-DVI-Cable-0-9/dp/B014RWWOAA/ref=sr_1_3_acs_pb_intl_sl_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1539461719&sr=8-3-acs&keywords=displayport+dvi+cable
great pc useing it now.
Bought this for my sister and she hasn't used her slow laptop since.  Worth every penny
Bought this for my son so he can live stream from his xbox.had the computer for one day everything looking good. excellent condition was a day late on deliver.

This is well worth the money, I always had a all in one, but it packed in after 7 years, and bought this wee cheap machine, and I love it, it does just everything the all in one does, if not more. A very good buy, well spent money â€¦ NS . ...
This was a christmas present for my grandaughter who loved it ok
it works great it might not run Minecraft as it needs better graphics but all you need is the black sub Ariel in the box provided to hook up to the internet must buy so good
The computer arrived with no drivers ever installed,and missing DVD player. Not fit for purpose
